local freetype = require'freetype'

A ffi binding of FreeType 2.

Binary

The included freetype binary is a stripped build of freetype. Only CFF/OpenType, TrueType and SFNT fonts are supported. Also, it depends on libpng for embedded bitmaps and on harfbuzz for the autohinter.

Building

Refer to csrc/freetype/WHAT for how to build it.
